reli_address: Na Lysinách 551/34, Prague 4 - Hodkovičky, zip code 147 00
otp_desc: A confirmation email has been sent to email address.
pass_otp_desc: Write your email for confirmation and data security
delete_account_desc: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
transportation_calculate_text: Shipping will be calculated at the next step
save_info_for_future: Save the information for future purchases
payment_end_title: Your order has been successfully created!
payment_end_desc: Your order N111 has been created at 00:00 19.05.25. You will receive a confirmation email with the order information
who_we_are_text: Marketplace Reli is more than just a digital marketplace - it is a collective of passionate innovators, technology aficionados, and customer-centric professionals. United by a shared vision, our diverse team is dedicated to building a transparent, secure, and user-centric environment where commerce and community intersect harmoniously
our_mission_text: Marketplace Reli is committed to fostering a vibrant community where individuals and businesses can discover, buy, and sell with confidence. Our mission is to empower entrepreneurs, support small businesses, and delight customers by delivering exceptional products and services.
what_sets_us_first: We place the utmost priority on user safety and data privacy. Our platform is fortified with advanced security protocols and proactive moderation systems to ensure a secure and trustworthy experience for all participants.
what_sets_us_second: From artisanal handcrafted goods to state-of-the-art technology, Marketplace Reli showcases an eclectic array of products sourced from a global network of sellers.
what_sets_us_third: Our dedicated customer service team is always available to guide and assist you - whether you have inquiries, encounter issues, or simply require support during your journey with us.
our_values_first: We conduct all operations with transparency, honesty, and fairness, ensuring mutual respect and trust in every interaction.
our_values_second: We are continuously evolving - leveraging technology and creativity to enhance our platform and user experience.
our_values_third: We celebrate the power of meaningful connections and aim to nurture a thriving network of buyers and sellers.
our_values_4: We actively promote environmentally responsible practices and support vendors committed to sustainable and ethical production.
how_start_desc: Creating an account with Marketplace Reli grants you access to a more personalized, efficient, and feature-rich shopping experience.
first_step_desc: On our platform click on the “Sign up” or “Register” button.
second_step_desc: Fill out required fields in the registration from, including your email address, username, password. We may also ask for additional information to help us tailor your experience to your preferences.
third_step_desc: After submitting your registration information, check your email inbox for a verification message from us. Click on the verification link provided to confirm your email address and activate your account.
fourth_step_desc: Once your account is activated, take a moment to complete your profile.
fifth_step_desc: With your account set up and ready to go, start exploring our marketplace. Browse through listings, add items to your cart, and enjoy the convenience of secure online shopping.
benefits_first: Personalized Recommendations: receive tailored product recommendations based on your browsing and purchase history.
benefits_second: Faster Checkout: save time at checkout by storing your shipping and payment information securely in your account.
benefits_third: Order Tracking: keep track of your orders and view their status anytime, anywhere.
security_desc: Your personal information is safeguarded by state-of-the-art security infrastructure. We are fully committed to maintaining the confidentiality and integrity of your data.
make_purchase_title: Purchasing on Marketplace Reli is designed to be intuitive and convenient. Here’s how:
purchase_first_step_desc: Start by browsing through the listings on our marketplace. Use the search bar to find specific items or explore categories to discover new products.
purchase_second_step_desc: Once you have found the item you want to purchase, click on its listing to view more details. Take a moment to read the item description, check the seller’s ratings, and review any available photos.
purchase_third_step_title: Add the Item To Your Cart and Review It
purchase_third_step_desc: When you have added items to your cart, review your cart to ensure everything looks correct. You can adjust quantities, remove items, or apply any available discount codes before proceeding to checkout.
purchase_fourth_step_desc: When you are ready to complete your purchase, click on the “Checkout” button.
purchase_fifth_step_desc: Enter your shipping address where you’d like your items to be delivered. Make sure to double-check the accuracy of your address to avoid any delivery issues.
purchase_sixth_step_desc: Select your preferred payment method from the options available. We accept a variety of payment methods.
purchase_seventh_step_desc: Follow the on-screen instructions to complete your purchase. If required, enter your payment details and confirm your order. Once your payment is processed successfully, you will receive an order confirmation email.
purchase_eighth_step_desc: You can track the status of your order using the tracking information provided in your order confirmation email or by logging into your Reli account.
delivery_title: At Marketplace Reli, we understand that flexible delivery solutions enhance the shopping experience. We offer several fulfillment methods to accommodate your preferences.
delivery_first_desc: Select from reputable courier partners to receive timely, traceable shipments directly to your location.
delivery_second_desc: Prefer to collect your purchase in person? Opt for local pickup from our designated warehouse.
delivery_third_desc: We proudly serve customers worldwide through international delivery services.
delivery_fourth_desc: Monitor the progress of your order via our integrated tracking tools.
payment_title: To ensure a smooth and secure checkout experience, Marketplace Reli supports multiple payment methods:
payment_first_desc: Pay securely using credit or debit cards via our encrypted payment gateway. Your financial data is protected by industry-leading security protocols.
payment_second_desc: With our cash on pickup option, you can finalize your payment when you collect your order in person. Simply select the payment method during checkout. Please note that cash payment are accepted in the local currency only.
payment_third_desc: Whether transacting online or offline, your payment details remain confidential and protected by best-in-class encryption standards.
support_title: If you have any questions or need assistance, our dedicated customer support team is here to help. Contact us at

marketplaceReli.title: Marketplace Reli
marketplaceReli.other_text: we are committed to delivering a seamless, secure, and enriching platform that empowers both buyers and sellers to engage, transact, and flourish. Whether you are in search of unique, high-quality products, seeking exceptional value, or aiming to showcase your own offerings, we strive to make your experience outstanding at every touchpoint.

step2_text: Complete the registration form by providing your email address, desired username, and password. Additional details may be requested to better tailor our services to your preferences.
step3_text: After submission, you will receive a verification email. Follow the link to confirm your address and activate your account.
step4_text: Finalize your registration by updating your profile for a customized experience.
step5_text: With your account activated, you are free to browse, shop, and enjoy all the benefits our marketplace offers.
benefit1_text: Receive personalized product suggestions based on your browsing and purchase history.
benefit2_text: Save your shipping and payment information securely for a quicker checkout experience.
benefit3_text: Monitor your order history and track deliveries effortlessly.
need_help_text: For assistance during registration or any account-related concerns, our support team is readily available. Contact us at
purchase_step1_text: Use our search function or browse product categories to find items that interest you.
purchase_step2_text: Click on a listing to see descriptions, images, and seller ratings. Evaluate carefully before proceeding.
purchase_step3_text: After selecting your desired items, review your cart. You may modify quantities, remove items, or apply promotional codes as needed.
purchase_step4_text: When ready, click the “Checkout” button to continue.
purchase_step5_text: Provide accurate delivery details to ensure successful order fulfillment.
purchase_step6_text: Choose from our available secure payment options.
purchase_step7_text: Follow the final prompts to confirm payment and complete the transaction. A confirmation email will follow.
purchase_step8_text: Stay updated with real-time order tracking through your account or email notifications.
support_text: For purchasing inquiries or technical support, contact us at
shipping_questions_text: Reach out to our team at
shipping_questions_other: for assistance with delivery options or logistics.
payment_cash_other: option and pay upon collection. Please note that cash is accepted in local currency only.
payment_support_text: If you need help choosing a payment method or experience any payment-related issues, contact us at
why_choose_list_1: With our broad network of buyers and sellers across Europe and worldwide, Marketplace Reli offers unmatched exposure and reach for your products and services.
why_choose_list_2: We equip sellers with comprehensive tools, resources, and dedicated support to help them grow and succeed in today’s competitive digital marketplace.
why_choose_list_3: Our pricing model is clear and straightforward. You only pay for the services you use - no hidden charges.
why_choose_list_4: As a seller on our platform, you gain access to powerful promotional tools such as featured listings and targeted advertising campaigns, designed to boost visibility, attract more customers, and increase sales.
why_choose_list_5: Selling on Marketplace Reli can be significantly more cost-effective than traditional marketing avenues. Our platform handles much of the promotion for you.
why_choose_list_6: Sellers benefit from direct feedback through customer reviews and ratings providing valuable insights to enhance product quality and customer satisfaction.
why_choose_list_7: All payments processed through Marketplace Reli are secure, handled via a trusted and reliable payment gateway.
why_choose_list_8: Our experienced support team is here to assist you - from onboarding and setup to ongoing assistance throughout your seller journey.
why_choose_list_9: Selling on Marketplace Reli gives you an edge in the market. Differentiate your products, offer attractive pricing, and capitalize on emerging trends to stay ahead of the competition.
info_for_seller_desc: Selling on Marketplace Reli involves a transparent fee system influenced by several factors:
info_for_seller_list_1: Fees may vary by product category, particularly if specific items require special handling, storage, or fulfillment solutions.
info_for_seller_list_2: We offer tiered pricing based on your sales performance or the number of listings. Higher-volume sellers may qualify for reduced rates.
info_for_seller_list_3: Optional premium services such as priority search placement, advertising packages, or fulfillment solutions are available for an additional fee.
info_for_seller_list_4: Periodically, we offer promotional campaigns and fee discounts during special events or seasonal promotions.
table_price_text_1: 13% if the price of an item is up to
table_price_text_2: 5% if the price of an item more than
after_table_text: Reli Group s.r.o. applies a standard acquiring fee, which covers the cost of payment processing. Additional marketplace commission is applied depending on category or promotion agreements.
start_selling_desc: After initial contact, a Reli manager will guide the Seller through the onboarding process. Sellers must provide complete product data. Your manager will help you: understand how to list your products properly, meet our technical and logistics requirements, answer onboarding-related questions.
start_selling_list_2: All sellers must agree to our platform’s terms and conditions, seller policies, and user agreements. These documents outline the roles, rights, and responsibilities of all participating sellers.
start_selling_list_3: Sellers are required to create accurate and informative product listings. This includes descriptions, images, pricing, availability, and other essential details to help customers make informed decisions.
start_selling_list_4: You must adhere to our guidelines regarding acceptable listings, prohibited items, intellectual property rights, shipping, customer service, and other operational standards.
start_selling_list_5: All products listed must meet Marketplace Reli’s quality criteria. This includes product authenticity, proper packaging, accurate labeling, and high levels of customer satisfaction.
start_selling_list_6: Sellers must accept our fee structure, which includes applicable listing fees, transaction commissions, and any relevant subscription charges.
start_selling_list_7: We expect sellers to provide prompt, courteous, and professional customer service. This includes responding to messages, resolving customer issues, handling returns, and managing disputes in a timely manner.
onboarding_preparation_notice: PLEASE PREPARE ALL REQUIRED PRODUCT INFORMATION BEFORE THE ONBOARDING EMAIL EXCHANGE TO SPEED UP THE PROCESS.

product_name_and_desc.title: Product Name and Description
product_name_and_desc.text5: Full description (up to 2000 characters, with advantages and features)

language_requirement.title: Language Requirement!
language_requirement.text1: All information must be provided in English
language_requirement.text2: Providing the same information in Czech is highly encouraged and helps speed up the approval and listing process

images_rules.title: Images
images_rules.text2: Minimum resolution: 708 x 708 pixels, RECOMMENDED 1024 x 1024 pixels
images_rules.text3: Images must be clear, sharp, well-lit, and free from watermarks, logos, or text overlays
images_rules.text4: The product should occupy at least 80% of the image frame
images_rules.text5: Include at least 1 main image (up to 5 additional ones from different angles or in use)

vat_percentage.title: VAT Percentage
vat_percentage.text: The applicable Value Added Tax (VAT) rate for each product, based on your local legislations or country of sale

product_dimensions_and_weight.title: Product Dimensions and Weight
product_dimensions_and_weight.text1: Provide accurate measurements in the following format:
product_dimensions_and_weight.list1: Length x Width x Height (in cm), (L x W x H – in this exact order)
product_dimensions_and_weight.text2: MISSING OR INACCURATE DIMENSIONS CAN RESULT IN SHIPPING ERRORS, INCORRECT DELIVERY PRICING, AND DELAYS

deadline_for_submitting_product_info.title: DEADLINE FOR SUBMITTING PRODUCT INFORMATION
deadline_for_submitting_product_info.text: You must submit all required product information within 30 days from the initial onboarding contact.

step_2_agreement_signing.title: STEP 2: Agreement Signing
step_2_agreement_signing.text: You have 30 calendar days to confirm and sign the cooperation agreement. If the agreement is not signed in time, onboarding will be paused.

step_3_final_approval_and_listing.title: STEP 3: Final Approval and Product Listing
step_3_final_approval_and_listing.text: Once all product data is delivered and approved, Reli Group s.r.o. will publish the products on the marketplace. Your assigned manager will support you throughout the process.

if_you_get_the_order.title: IF YOU GET THE ORDER
if_you_get_the_order.step1_text: You must confirm each new order within 24 hours (business days only).
if_you_get_the_order.step2_text: You are responsible for packing the order yourself, including.
if_you_get_the_order.step3_text: The order must be shipped within 3 business days after confirmation.
if_you_get_the_order.step4_text: The parcel must be handed over to the agreed transport company which is chosen by a buyer.

communication_policy.title: Communication Policy
communication_policy.text1: To avoid delays and ensure clear communication, please note:
communication_policy.list1: All communication must go through email:
communication_policy.list2: If you have questions, consult this document first, it was designed to answer most common issues and reduce back-and-forth
communication_policy.list3: Repeated or avoidable questions slow down the onboarding process for everyone. Please follow the steps and formats described here carefully.

mission_statement.other_text: our mission is to provide a seamless, secure, and efficient platform where buyers and sellers can connect, transact, and grow together. Whether you're in search of unique products, unbeatable deals, or a space to showcase your offerings, we are here to deliver an exceptional user experience. Marketplace Reli is more than just an e-commerce platform - we are a dynamic team of innovators, technology enthusiasts, and customer-centric professionals. Our commitment lies in building a trusted, transparent, and user-friendly environment for everyone involved.

name: Name

password.passwordCriteria: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit, and one special character

noContent.title: There are currently no selected items
noContent.desc: Try to reload the page or wait

generalProvisions.title: General Provisions
generalProvisions.text1: The Complaints Procedure is an integral part of the General Terms and Conditions of the seller Reli Group s.r.o, Company ID: 280 03 896, with its registered office at Na lysinách 551/34, 147 00 Prague 4, registered in the Commercial Register maintained by the Municipal Court in Prague, file no. C 361093 (hereinafter referred to as the "seller" or "Reli Group"), and describes the procedure for handling complaints regarding goods purchased from Reli Group.
generalProvisions.text2: The buyer is obliged to familiarize themselves with the Complaints Procedure and the General Terms and Conditions (hereinafter "GTC") before ordering goods. The buyer also acknowledges that they are required to provide Reli Group with the necessary cooperation for processing the complaint; otherwise, the time limits are adequately extended by the time during which the buyer did not provide the required cooperation.
generalProvisions.text3: By concluding the purchase contract and accepting the goods from the seller, the buyer agrees to this Complaints Procedure.
generalProvisions.text4: Definitions contained in this Complaints Procedure take precedence over definitions in the GTC. If this Complaints Procedure does not define a term, it is understood in the sense defined in the GTC. If it is not defined there either, it is understood in the sense in which it is used in legal regulations.
generalProvisions.text5: In case of claiming service under a purchased or agreed service, this service intervention is governed exclusively by the terms of the respective service.

warrantyForQuality.title: Warranty for Quality
warrantyForQuality.text1: As proof of the warranty, Reli Group issues a document of purchase (invoice) for each purchased item, containing legally required details necessary for claiming the warranty (especially the name of the goods, length of the warranty, price, quantity, serial number).
warrantyForQuality.text2: At the express request of the buyer, Reli Group provides a warranty in the form of a warranty certificate. However, usually, if the nature of the item allows it, the seller issues a proof of purchase instead of a warranty certificate containing the specified details.
warrantyForQuality.text3: If required for the provided warranty, Reli Group will clearly explain the content of the warranty in the warranty certificate, stating its scope, conditions, duration, and the way claims can be made. The warranty certificate will also state that providing the warranty does not affect the buyer's rights related to the purchase of the item.
warrantyForQuality.text4: 1. Period for Exercising Rights from Defective Performance
warrantyForQuality.text5: The period for exercising rights from defective performance starts from the day the buyer takes over the goods, i.e., the day indicated on the proof of purchase or warranty certificate.
warrantyForQuality.text6_3: - 21 months for almost new goods (almost new goods are used goods that have been checked by our specialists and marked as such).
warrantyForQuality.text6_4: - 12 months for used goods (used goods are those marked as used or serviced without defect, and the completeness of the package does not prevent full use of the product).
warrantyForQuality.text6_5: - 12 months for refurbished goods (refurbished goods are those marked "refurbished" and have undergone a service intervention by our specialists).
warrantyForQuality.text7: For consumable goods (e.g., cosmetics, toiletries, etc.), the buyer is entitled to exercise the right from defect within twenty-four (24) months unless an expiration date is indicated on the goods, in which case the period is shortened only to the date indicated on the packaging.
warrantyForQuality.text8: The period ends on the corresponding date, which numerically matches the start date. The length of the period in months is indicated for each product in the seller's store and is sufficiently marked on the proof of purchase.
warrantyForQuality.text9: Rights from liability for defects in goods, for which a quality warranty applies, expire if not exercised within the specified period. In the case of resolving a complaint by replacing the goods, a new period does not start; the decisive period is the one starting from the day the buyer takes over the goods.
warrantyForQuality.text11: If the item has a defect, the buyer can request its removal. According to their choice, they can request the delivery of a new item without defects or the repair of the item unless the chosen method of defect removal is impossible or disproportionately costly compared to the other, considering the significance of the defect, the value the item would have without the defect, and whether the defect can be removed in another way without significant difficulties for the buyer.
warrantyForQuality.text12: The seller may refuse to remove the defect if it is impossible or disproportionately costly, particularly considering the significance of the defect and the value the item would have without the defect.
warrantyForQuality.text13_1: The buyer can request a reasonable discount or withdraw from the contract if:
warrantyForQuality.text13_2: a) the seller refused to remove the defect or did not remove it in accordance with § 2170 (1) and (2);
warrantyForQuality.text13_4: c) the defect is a substantial breach of the contract;
warrantyForQuality.text13_5: d) it is clear from the seller's statement or the circumstances that the defect will not be removed within a reasonable time or without significant difficulties for the buyer.
warrantyForQuality.text14: A reasonable discount is determined as the difference between the value of the item without the defect and the defective item received by the buyer.
warrantyForQuality.text15: If the buyer withdraws from the contract, the seller will return the purchase price to the buyer without undue delay after receiving the item or after the buyer proves that the item has been sent.
warrantyForQuality.text17_1: The seller is responsible to the buyer that the item is without defects upon acceptance. Specifically, the seller is responsible that at the time the buyer took over the item:
warrantyForQuality.text17_3: - The item has properties that the parties agreed on, and if such an agreement is missing, properties that the seller or manufacturer described or that the buyer expected given the nature of the goods and based on the advertising they conducted.
warrantyForQuality.text17_4: - The item is suitable for the purpose the seller states for its use or for which an item of this kind is usually used.
warrantyForQuality.text17_5: - The item is in the corresponding quantity, measure, or weight.
warrantyForQuality.text17_6: - The item complies with the requirements of legal regulations.
warrantyForQuality.text18: If a defect appears within one year of acceptance, it is assumed that the item was defective upon acceptance unless the seller proves otherwise.
warrantyForQuality.text20: Beyond the legal period (24 months), Reli Group may provide free service within the indicated period, governed exclusively by this Complaints Procedure and especially by the free service, see Article VII. This free service does not mean the same as the paid "Extended Warranty" service, the conditions of which are governed exclusively by the conditions of that service.

warrantyConditions.title: Warranty Conditions
warrantyConditions.text2: The buyer inspects the goods, its completeness, and the integrity of the packaging during personal acceptance from the seller.
warrantyConditions.text3: When accepting from the carrier, the buyer thoroughly inspects the condition of the shipment (especially the number of packages, the integrity of the company tape with the logo, the integrity or damage to the packaging) according to the delivery note.
warrantyConditions.text4: The buyer further inspects the completeness of the goods on the day of acceptance, particularly ensuring that the packaging contains everything it should.
warrantyConditions.text5: Any discrepancies must be reported to the seller during personal acceptance onsite, marked in the carrier's delivery protocol when accepting from the carrier, or the buyer can refuse to accept the shipment, or it can always be reported via email
warrantyConditions.text5_1: Additionally, Reli Group recommends attaching photographic documentation of the damage and packaging in case of acceptance from the carrier.
warrantyConditions.text6: These provisions do not affect the statutory period for exercising rights from defective performance. Subsequent complaints about incompleteness or external damage to the shipment do not deprive the buyer of the right to claim, but they give Reli Group the opportunity to prove that it is not a discrepancy with the purchase contract.
warrantyConditions.text8: Reli Group recommends submitting a complaint at an authorized service center for faster processing if available for the type of goods in question. The list of authorized service centers can be found here.
warrantyConditions.text9: For large appliances (washing machines, refrigerators, stoves, built-in appliances), it is recommended to complain through the authorized service center, which will ensure service at your home.
warrantyConditions.text11: Reli Group does not guarantee full compatibility of sold components with other components not approved by Reli Group employees, the manufacturer, or the supplier, nor with software applications whose functionality was not expressly requested by the buyer in a written order, unless such compatibility is usual for similar goods and it was not explicitly stated by Reli Group that the goods are compatible only with the listed items or are incompatible only with the listed items.
warrantyConditions.text12: This also applies similarly to software and its individual versions. Additionally, if the compatibility of certain software versions was declared, this does not automatically apply to their subsequent or preceding versions.
warrantyConditions.text14: Tampering with protective seals, informational labels, or serial numbers exposes the buyer to the risk of having the warranty claim denied, unless the damage occurs during normal use. Seals and serial numbers are integral parts of the product and do not restrict the customer's right to use and handle the product fully as intended.
warrantyConditions.text15: The warranty does not cover damages caused by (unless such activity is usual and not prohibited in the accompanying user manual):
warrantyConditions.text17: - Electrical surges (visible burned components or circuit boards) except for normal deviations,
warrantyConditions.text18: - Using the product in conditions that do not match the temperature, dust, humidity, chemical, and mechanical influences specified by the seller or manufacturer,
warrantyConditions.text19: - Improper installation, handling, operation, or neglecting product care,
warrantyConditions.text20: - Damage to the product or its part by a computer virus, etc.
warrantyConditions.text21: - Defects occurring only in software where the customer cannot prove a legal way of acquisition, or by using unauthorized software and consumables,
warrantyConditions.text22: - Damage caused by excessive load or use contrary to the conditions stated in the documentation or general principles,
warrantyConditions.text23: - Unauthorized intervention or changes in parameters (unauthorized intervention is understood as any intervention by any person other than the seller or an authorized service),
warrantyConditions.text24: - Products that have been modified by the customer (painting, bending, etc.), if the defect arose as a result of this modification,
warrantyConditions.text26: - Damage by natural disasters or force majeure,
warrantyConditions.text27: - Use of incorrect or defective software,
warrantyConditions.text28: - Use of incorrect or non-original consumables, and any damages resulting from it, unless such use is usual and not excluded in the accompanying user manual.
warrantyConditions.text29: These limitations do not apply if the properties of the goods, contrary to the above conditions, were expressly agreed upon, reserved, or declared by the buyer and Reli Group, or can be expected due to advertising or usual usage.
warrantyConditions.text31: Goods submitted for a warranty claim will be tested only for the defect specified by the buyer (in the warranty claim form, in the attached description of the defect). Reli Group recommends a written form for specifying the defect, which also includes electronic communication.
warrantyConditions.text32: If the warranty claim is denied and the buyer agrees to a paid repair, the repair will be charged according to the current price list of the authorized service center.
warrantyConditions.text33: The buyer acknowledges that Reli Group does not perform paid repairs but only mediates them with authorized service centers or ensures communication and transportation with them. Reli Group is not responsible for the execution of the repair.
warrantyConditions.text34: Before performing a paid repair, the buyer will be informed of the repair cost, its scope, and the time required for its completion. The repair will be performed no later than 60 days from the day following the acceptance of the goods by Reli Group. Paid repairs will only be carried out with the express consent of the buyer (or based on a concluded service contract) given after the aforementioned information.
warrantyConditions.text36: When handing over a computer system or data storage device for a warranty claim or repair, the buyer must secure an appropriate backup of the necessary data and prevent possible misuse or damage to them. Reli Group is not responsible for any loss, damage, or misuse of data stored on data storage devices in the computer system.
warrantyConditions.text37: Data storage devices are devices whose failure rate is an objective phenomenon with random failure occurrence. Reli Group hereby informs the buyer of this fact and recommends systematic backing up of user data on suitable devices. However, the warranty on the goods is not limited by this notification.
warrantyConditions.text38: The buyer acknowledges that if a warranty claim is resolved by replacing the data storage device, the original device will not be returned.
warrantyConditions.text41: Reli Group has the right to deny a warranty claim if the claimed goods and/or its parts are dirty or do not meet the basic requirements for hygienically safe handling of the goods for the warranty process. In the case of a device with a fuel tank, the tank must be empty at the time of receiving the claim.
warrantyConditions.text43: If access to the device is protected by a password, gesture, or other access security, the buyer is obligated to remove this protection or provide the password in the defect description when making a warranty claim. Otherwise, Reli Group has the right to deny the claim. The same applies if the BIOS or firmware of the device or access to the device's storage is protected in this manner. Without full access to the device, repair or diagnosis may not be possible.
warrantyConditions.text44: If any service that secures the device against theft is activated on the device, the buyer must deactivate this service before making a warranty claim. Otherwise, Reli Group has the right to deny the claim. This applies to services like Apple Find My iPhone, iPod touch, MacBook, Intel anti-theft, and others.
warrantyConditions.text45: 8. Factory Configuration, Modifications Made by the Buyer
warrantyConditions.text46: The buyer is hereby informed to ensure that the device submitted for a warranty claim is in factory configuration. This particularly concerns added or replaced RAM, hard drives, or SSDs in notebooks and computers. The seller bears no responsibility for such attached parts, especially if they are not explicitly stated in the claim receipt.
warrantyConditions.text47: Original components should be retained for possible warranty claims, particularly for contract rescission.
warrantyConditions.text48: If the buyer submits goods for a warranty claim that are not in factory configuration, i.e., modified by the buyer or at the buyer's request, the buyer acknowledges that service intervention may invalidate such modification without compensation. In case of modifications, the buyer should retain original components.
warrantyConditions.text49: A modification by the buyer means, for example:
warrantyConditions.text50: a) Added or replaced RAM, hard drives, or SSDs in notebooks and computers
warrantyConditions.text51: b) Application of foil or protective glass on a phone or similar device, application of skin or sticker on the device, patch on clothing, and similar modifications.

handlingComplaints.title: Handling Complaints
handlingComplaints.text2: The seller will decide on the complaint immediately, in complicated cases within three working days. This period does not include the time necessary for the type of product or service required for expert assessment of the defect.
handlingComplaints.text3: Reli Group will handle the complaint, including the removal of the defect, without undue delay, no later than 30 days from the day following the complaint submission. The 30-day period can be extended upon agreement with the buyer, but such an extension cannot be indefinite or excessively long. After the period, or the extended period, has expired, it is assumed that the defect on the item indeed existed, and the buyer has the same rights as if it were a defect that cannot be removed.

generalProvisions2.text2: Reli Group will issue the buyer a written confirmation of the date and method of complaint resolution, including confirmation of the repair and the duration of the complaint process, or a justification for the rejection of the complaint.
generalProvisions2.text3: After resolving the complaint, Reli Group will inform the buyer about the resolution either by phone, SMS, or email. If the goods were sent by a carrier, they will be automatically sent back to the buyer's address after resolution.
generalProvisions2.text4: After handling an acknowledged complaint through repair or replacement, the warranty period of the device is extended by the duration of the complaint process. The duration of the complaint is calculated from the day following the submission until the day the buyer was informed about the resolution.
generalProvisions2.text5: The buyer has the right to reimbursement of reasonably incurred costs associated with making a justified complaint. These costs are understood as the minimum necessary, primarily the postage for sending the complaint. These costs do not include traveling by car to make a complaint or express delivery and similar services. Reimbursement of costs must be requested without undue delay, but no later than one month after the end of the period for exercising rights from defective performance.
generalProvisions2.text6: The buyer is obliged to check the received goods and their compliance with the complaint delivery protocol. The buyer must also check the completeness of the goods, ensuring that the package contains everything it should. Later objections will not be considered.
generalProvisions2.text7: These provisions do not affect the statutory period for exercising rights from defective performance.
generalProvisions2.text8: The buyer must pick up the complaint without undue delay within 30 days from the day they were informed about the resolution. This period cannot end earlier than 60 days from the complaint submission.
generalProvisions2.text9: If the buyer does not pick up the complaint by the last day of the period, the seller will charge a storage fee of 2 Euros including VAT for each day of delay after the period expires.
generalProvisions2.text10: If the buyer does not collect the goods from the resolved complaint within two months from the day they were informed about the resolution, Reli Group reserves the right to sell the goods and use the proceeds to cover the storage fee.
generalProvisions2.text11: When collecting goods or cashing in a credit note in person after the complaint resolution, the buyer must present the document on which the item was accepted for the complaint and prove their identity with a valid ID (ID card, passport) to prevent damages and money laundering. Without presenting one of these documents, Reli Group or its contractual partner may refuse to hand over the goods or cash the credit note. If the buyer is a legal entity, the goods or credit note will only be handed over to the statutory body of the legal entity or a person with a verified power of attorney.

consumablesAndLifespan.title: Consumables and Lifespan
consumablesAndLifespan.text2: If the subject of the purchase is consumable material (e.g., cartridges, toner, print head, print drum, projector lamp, batteries, various types of lighting, etc.) or if this material is part of the purchased goods, the lifespan applies instead of the quality warranty. The lifespan can be specified by time, product usage, number of uses, number of printed pages, or similarly. There may be more than one such lifespan for a product. To successfully claim a warranty, all specified conditions must be met.
consumablesAndLifespan.text3: The buyer's right to complain about goods within the statutory warranty period is not affected. However, the buyer must consider the above facts, as the warranty does not cover wear and tear caused by normal use, and it should not be confused with the product's lifespan. The lifespan represents the susceptibility to wear and tear caused by normal use. If you use (not just own) the product longer than its usual lifespan, it is likely that the defect is due to normal wear and tear, though it is not excluded that it is a warranty defect.

generalProtectionIntro.title: 1. Introduction
generalProtectionIntro.desc: The policy outlines the data protection practices and procedures implemented by Reli Group s.r.o. (“the Marketplace”) to comply with the General Data Protection Regulations (GDPR) and protect the personal data of users, including buyers, sellers, and visitors.

generalScope.title: 2. Scope
generalScope.desc: This policy applies to all personal data processed by the Marketplace, including data collected through the Marketplace’s website, mobile applications, and any other digital platforms.

list.text1: The Marketplace collects and processes personal data only for specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes.
list.text2: Personal data is collected lawfully, fairly, and transparently, with the knowledge and consent of the data subjects
list.text3: Personal data is kept accurate, up-to-date, and relevant for the purposes for which it was collected.
list.text4: Data minimization principles are followed to ensure that only necessary personal data is collected and processed.

generalBasis.title: 4. Lawful Basis and Processing
generalBasis.desc: The Marketplace ensures that there is a lawful basis for processing personal data, such as consent, contractual necessity, legal obligations, vital interests, or legitimate interests.

list.text1: The Marketplace implements appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of personal data, including encryption, access controls, and regular security assessments.
list.text2: Personal data is protected against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.

list.text1: Data subjects have the right to access, rectify, erase, and restrict the processing of their personal data.
list.text2: The Marketplace provides mechanisms for data subjects to exercise their rights, including designated contact points for data inquiries and requests.

list.text1: The Marketplace has procedures in place to detect, investigate, and report data breaches in accordance with GDPR requirements.
list.text2: Data breaches are promptly reported to the relevant supervisory authority and affected individual.

list.text1: Any transfers of personal data outside the EU/EEA are conducted with GDPR requirements.
list.text2: Appropriate safeguards, such as standard contractual clauses or binding corporate rules, are implemented to protect transferred data.

list.text1: The Marketplace enters into data processing agreements with third-party service providers that process personal data on its behalf.
list.text2: These agreements include provisions to ensure compliance with GDPR requirements and protect the rights of data subjects.

list.text1: Employees who handle personal data receive training on GDPR principles and best practices.
list.text2: Awareness-raising activities are conducted to educate staff and users about data protection obligations and procedures.

list.text1: The Marketplace conducts regular audits and compliance checks to ensure ongoing adherence to GDPR requirements.
list.text2: Policies and procedures are updated as needed to reflect changes in regulations or business practices.

policyReview.title: 12. Policy Review
policyReview.desc: This GDPR Compliance Policy is reviewed and updated regularly to ensure its effectiveness and alignment with legal requirements and industry standards.

moreInformation.title: 13. Where you will find more information about GDPR
moreInformation.desc: You can learn more about GDPR on the following third-party website:

cookiesTitle: We use cookies and similar technologies
cookiesDesc: Our website uses strictly necessary cookies to enable shopping cart, registration, and payment functionality. We may also store your preferences (such as selected language or theme) and collect analytics to improve the website and measure its performance.
privacySettingsDesc: You can choose which categories of cookies and technologies we may use. You can change your choice at any time via the “Privacy Settings” link at the bottom of the site.
strictlyNecessaryDesc: Required for the website to function: login, shopping cart, order processing, and security. Without these, the website cannot work properly.
preferencesDesc: Help remember your settings, such as interface language, theme, or selected products, so the website looks and behaves the way you prefer.
analyticsDesc: Allow us to understand how the website is used, which pages are popular, and to evaluate the effectiveness of advertising campaigns through Google services.
